entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sachigo Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
